original: Sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: anāsavam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anāsavam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasāsavo
analyzed: paṭicca na sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anāsavam dhammam paṭicca na sa āsavaḥ

original: ca naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na anāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Sāsavañca anāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa āsavam ca anāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
